Original REVLON One Step Volumizer has NEW Features.
The same Brush designed with Nylon Pin & Tufted Bristles for detangling, improved volume and control. NEW: Safety First: The Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumizer meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal (look for the 'test' button on the plug which is required for all hair dryers in the U.S.) Also, look for the BLACK base which has extra VENTs for cooler operating.

TELL ME EVERYTHING
Over the last 20+ years I have tried all kinds of irons, and could never find one that had everything I wanted. This iron combines all of my favorite features, and allows you to create 4 of my favorite styles - sleek straight, s-waves, flat iron waves, and polished curls.

GOLD METAL
Titanium plates with temperature sensing rapid heat technology outperform ceramic, delivering fast, even heat from root to tip, and are corrosion-resistant to styling products

LAID DOWN
Negative ions help lock in moisture, eliminate frizz, and enhance shine, for healthier-looking hair

SMOOTH + SLEEK
1 1/4" plates adjust to your hair texture for smooth styling without snagging or creasing

PERFECT CURVES
Rounded body easily creates subtle bend, polished curls and textured waves

TO EACH THEIR OWN
Digital display + 4 temperature pre-sets (up to 440° F) allows you to customize the temperature to your hair type and texture

LESS STRESS
Automatic shut-off after 30 min of non-use, a heat resistant cap and 9 ft swivel cord


For video tutorials and additional product information go to kristinesshair website or follow @kristin_ess

Sulfate-free
The shampoo for pretty much anyone. The thing I love about this formula is it gets your hair super clean but also leaves it feeling moisturized and looking shiny. It's hard to find a shampoo, particularly a sulfate-free shampoo, that can do both so well.

Lather, rinse, repeat! You know the drill, right!?
How to:
1. Depending on the thickness of your hair, squeeze a dime to quarter-sized amount of shampoo into your palm.
2. Apply to wet hair, massaging into the scalp to create a rich lather.
3. Rinse clean and repeat if necessary.
Tip: If my hair is extra oily or has a lot of product in it, I like to shampoo twice.

Contains Zip-Up Technology™, our proprietary strengthening complex designed to "zip-up" split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping to protect hair from environmental stressors and color fade.

Details:
Chat with a Target Beauty Concierge
Sulfate Free
Highlights
brass reducing
instantly illuminating
shine restoring
safe for daily use
sulfate-free
The One Purple Shampoo
I love brass… in my house, not your hair. I wanted to create a purple shampoo that was both great for toning and also sulfate-free because I've always had a hard time finding that combo. If you like ashier tones, you can use this every time you shampoo. If you want more neutral tones, use it every other time you shampoo to balance out unwanted brassiness. It can be used with or without The One Purple Conditioner. And yes, this shampoo can be used on color treated or naturally blonde hair.
One and done.

Toning time!


How to:
1. Depending on the thickness of your hair, apply a dime to quarter-sized amount of shampoo into your palm.

2. Apply to wet hair, massaging into the scalp to create a rich lather.

3. With purple shampoo you want to make sure you apply more product where you see more brass. I like to let it sit a little longer toward the top where hair is less porous and tends to be warmer in tone (2-3 min), then I let it run down through the ends where it's more porous for less time (1-2 min).

4. Rinse well and follow with conditioner.
Tip: If ever you go overboard and your hair gets too ashy for your liking, just shampoo once with The One Signature Shampoo to remove one level of tone.

PATCH TEST: Apply a small amount of product to dry, cleansed inner side of elbow. Wait for 48 hours. Do not use this product if you experience any burning, redness, swelling or itching.

Highlights
brass reducing
shine renewing
moisturizing + smoothing
safe for daily use
sulfate-free
The One Purple Conditioner
For those who are really prone to unwanted brassiness, take at-home toning one step further with purple conditioner. I created this with moisture and tone in mind. Most people who experience brassiness have had bleach or color applied to their hair so moisture and shine are a top priority. This can be used with or without The One Purple Shampoo.
Let's seal the deal.
How to:

1. After shampooing + rinsing, depending on the thickness of your hair, squeeze a dime to quarter-sized amount into your palm.

2. Apply to wet hair starting at the ends and working your way up to the top, avoiding the last inch or two near the root.

3. Wait 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

Tip: If ever you over-do it and your hair is too ashy for your liking, just shampoo once with The One Signature Shampoo to remove one level of tone.

OUR HAIR CARE PROMISE: Love Beauty and Planet Smooth and Serene Argan Oil & Lavender Shampoo calms your frizzy hair for strands that are oh so smooth.
ARGAN OIL SHAMPOO: Our Argan Oil Silicone Free Shampoo is infused with Organic Coconut Oil for hair and smooths frizzy hair for healthy looking tresses.
VEGAN SHAMPOO WITH INGREDIENTS INSPIRED BY NATURE: Infused with Argan Oil, this anti frizz shampoo will delicately surround your hair in a cloud of heirloom French Lavender.
YES Safe for Colored hair, YES Vegan Shampoo, YES with Plant based Cleansers, YES Organic Coconut Oil for Hair, YES 100% Recyclable Bottle, YES Paraben free shampoo, YES Silicone free shampoo
HAIR SHAMPOO FORMULA WITH FIVE FREE FROMS: Paraben-free, Silicone-free, Dye-free, Cruelty-free, Phthalate-free
At Love Beauty and Planet we are committed to acts of love that make you and our planet a little more beautiful, everyday. Our goal is a carbon footprint so small it's like we weren't even here. We started our journey by loading our beauty products with goodness. Every one of our shampoo bottles is made from 100% recycled materials and is recyclable. Our caps and pumps aren't made from recycled plastics yet, but we're working on it. All our shampoos are also paraben free, silicone free, dye free, cruelty free, and phthalate free. Calm your frizz for hair that's oh so smooth with our Smooth and Serene Shampoo! Our anti frizz shampoo is made with plant based cleansers and infused with organic coconut oil. Delicately surrounds your hair in a cloud of heirloom French Lavender, sourced ethically from the Drôme Provençale Region of France. How to use? Simply squeeze, lather and rinse. Go easy on the tap! For brilliantly beautiful hair, try our line of frizzy hair control products, follow up with our anti frizz Love Beauty and Planet Argan Oil & Lavender Smooth and Serene Conditioner and finish with our Love Beauty and Planet Argan Oil & Lavender Smooth and Serene Leave-in Smoothie Cream. Don't stop with beautiful hair from our silicone free shampoo and hair products! Envelop your skin with Love Beauty and Planet Argan Oil & Lavender Relaxing Rain Body Wash for a soothing relaxed feel. We are starting a beautiful movement. Are you in? To learn more about our shine shampoo and our other frizz control hair products, visit lovebeautyplanet website.

Hands down, the best affordable dry texturizing spray. I truly mean that. Create a soft matte texture or lived-in look by applying a light veil all over. Focus mostly on the roots and middle of the hair.
Rarely do I make waves without this.
How to:
1. Create your desired hairstyle.
2. Add textured, soft matte finish and lasting hold by spraying this at the root first and then add a small amount from middle to ends.
Tip: Apply a little, wait 30 seconds, then see if you need more. Give the spray a chance to dry, creating texture and grit before adding a second layer.
Contains Zip-Up Technology, our proprietary strengthening complex designed to "zip-up" split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping to protect hair from environmental stressors and color fade.

moisturizing + calming
gently restoring
shine renewing

sulfate-free
Extra Gentle Conditioner
As someone with very sensitive skin and scalp myself, I think it's important to have an option for those of us who need an extra gentle formula and a more subtle fragrance. This sulfate-free conditioner will leave your hair soft, shiny and totally weightless.
Soften and smooth the parts of your hair your natural oils can't reach.
How to:
1. After shampooing + rinsing, depending on the thickness of your hair, squeeze a dime to quarter-sized amount into your palm.
2. On wet hair, apply from the bottom and work your way to the top.
3. Wait 3 minutes and rinse thoroughly.
Tip: Not rinsing conditioner thoroughly can cause build up. Get in there, girl!

Details:
Chat with a Target Beauty Concierge
Paraben Free
Highlights
for pre-lightened or highlighted blonde hair
temporary toning
instant blush color
in-shower application
Rose Gold Temporary Tint
I'm always looking for ways to play with pastel tones in the hair. This is the first ever in-shower watercolor that creates a temporary tone when sprayed on wet hair and then rinsed out. The intensity is up to you. When you spray it on damp, towel-dried hair it will soak up more color and last longer. If you spray it on wet hair it will give you a more subtle tone and will rinse out faster. The pink tone is most visible on pre-lightened/highlighted or blonde hair and washes out in 1-3 shampoos depending on the porosity of your hair.
Rosé all day weekend!
How to:

1. Shampoo your hair and rinse.

2. Apply spray in the shower on wet hair. For a more intense pink color, towel dry the hair before you spray. For a more subtle hint of pink, spray it directly on freshly rinsed hair. (The less water there is on the hair, the more tone the hair will soak up. Think of your hair as a sponge! If it's full of water it can only absorb a little color.)
3. Once you feel you've covered the hair you want to color, wait 1-2 minutes and then rinse.

4. Follow it up with your favorite conditioner or mask.
Tip: Do a small test piece in the sink and then blow dry it. You'll know how much color your hair will soak up and how quickly it will rinse out.

PATCH TEST: Apply a small amount of product to dry, cleansed inner side of elbow. Wait for 48 hours. Do not use this product if you experience any burning, redness, swelling or itching.

Sea Salt Air Dry Spray
Where do I even start with this one? This is a brand new kind of sea salt spray. First of all, can we talk about the spray? SO OBSESSED! It has a super-fine, constant mist which ensures a more even application than your average pump applicator. Second, the feeling! No salty, crunchy, chalky texture, just satin-grit that stays touchable and soft. Btw, the difference between this one and my Soft Shine Beach Wave Spray is this one goes on wet/damp hair and the other one is for finishing so that one goes on dry hair.
Waves for days!

How to:
1. Apply an even mist all over on damp, towel or t-shirt dried hair.
2. Scrunch your hair as it air dries to encourage any wave pattern.

Tip: I don't recommend using this on tighter curls or any hair type that needs moisture. Try the Soft Shine Beach Wave Spray on curly hair types instead!

1. After shampooing & rinsing, run a small amount from middle to ends.

Tip: Use this once a week for extra shine and softness. For a more intense treatment, apply then cover with a plastic shower cap and allow to stay on for up to an hour. Rinse well.

Highlights
For all hair types
Root-to-end volumizing
Instant fullness
Shine renewing
Lasting style support
Imagine a liquid mousse. I use this whenever I need to evenly distribute volume throughout the hair. I spray this on towel-dried, combed out hair and it instantly volumizes without weighing anything down. Leaves the hair looking shiny and full.

An easy-to-apply alternative for those who have trouble using a traditional mousse, but still want to add thickness and lasting hold after styling.
1. Apply to towel dried hair before blow drying.
2. Use 5-7 sprays from roots to ends, making sure you apply as evenly as possible.
3. Flip hair upside down while blow drying for extra lift and hold at the root.
4. Once hair is completely dry, style with hot tools as desired.
Tip: This will provide great support, lasting hold and finish when styling with hot tools, which allows you to avoid using hairspray before curling or flat ironing.

Contains Zip-Up Technology™, our proprietary strengthening complex designed to "zip-up" split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping to protect hair from environmental stressors and color fade.

Our goal is a carbon footprint so small, it's like we weren't even here. We've started our journey by packing our products in recyclable cartons. Our delicate scents are infused with natural and ethically sourced oils and extracts.
At Love Beauty and Planet we are committed to acts of love that make you and our planet a little more beautiful, everyday. Our goal is a carbon footprint so small it's like we weren't even here. Enjoy a fragrant bath with lush Amazonian Murumuru Butter and scents of handpicked Bulgarian Rose, ethically sourced from the Rose Valley of Bulgaria. How to use our fragrant bath bombs? Fill your bath tub with warm water, unwrap the bath bomb, and drop it in your tub for some fizzy fun. Soak in and let the delightful scents take you away. Details:
Chat with a Target Beauty Concierge
Highlights
handle rotates between 180° & 90°
titanium barrel delivers heat faster
ionic technology boost shine
even heat for more consistent waves
4 digital settings up to 425° f
TELL ME EVERYTHING
People always ask me why they would use a curling wand versus a curling iron. The answer is simple, you use a wand then you want fuller, more voluminous waves/curls. And you use a curling iron when you want more polished, textured waves. This wand is my go to for creating loose waves on medium to long lengths, or subtle bend shorter lengths.

SOFT WAVES + VOLUMINOUS CURLS
Perfect for creating easy, everyday waves or soft, bouncy curls

TAKE IT EASY
Innovative handle rotates from 180° to 90°, for easier styling, and less stress on your arms

QUICK + EFFICIENT
Titanium barrel with temperature sensing rapid heat technology out performs ceramic, delivering fast, even heat, for more consistent curls and longer lasing styles

SHINE ON
Negative ions help lock in moisture, enhance shine and eliminate frizz

TO EACH THEIR OWN
Digital display + 4 temperature pre-sets (up to 425° F) allow you to customize the temperature to your hair type and texture

LESS STRESS
Automatic shut-off after 30 min of non-use and 9 ft swivel cord

For video tutorials and additional product information go to kristinesshair website or follow @kristin_ess
Hair Type: All Hair Types
Number of Pieces: 1

Number of Heat Settings: 4

Vinylux long wear polish and top coat are a system that is uniquely design to work together. This patent-pending pro-light technology creates a powerful network of cross-linked polymer bonds that build resistance to chips, and enhance durability with exposure to natural light over time.

The new formula with Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Keratin as well as advanced micropores allows for a sleek, smooth coating, strengthened by an infusion of three new caring ingredients to give you all the care your nails need
New superior brush is an ergonomic, curve-hugging brush for flawless coverage. Easily coats the entire nail for a smooth & easy application.

The CND VINYLUX patented formula includes ProLight Technology to increase nail polish durability with natural light exposure. No need for UV or LED light, just natural light for curing.

How to Use:
The CND VINYLUX is a two-step system consisting of a color coat and a top coat, which must be used together for ultimate performance. No base coat needed!

Details:
Chat with a Target Beauty Concierge
Highlights
Massaging Eye Wand and Eye Cream
Gentle vibrations and heat help prep the skin to better absorb product
Works best with e.l.f.'s illuminating eye cream
Relax and prep the skin around the eyes with the e.l.f.'s Massaging Eye Wand and Illuminating Eye Cream. The gentle vibrations and heat from the wand help retain moisture to better absorb eye cream. The device features a curved handle that is designed to provide ease of use while a cap protects the device. Included in packaging: one AAA battery to power the device and e.l.f.'s Illuminating Eye Cream. e.l.f.'s illuminating eye cream minimizes dark circles, nourishes and deeply hydrates the skin with jojoba, vitamin E, and cucumber. How to use: Remove wrapping of the eye massage wand and insert battery provided into the device. Apply the device to the eye area, and place your fingers on the smart sensor (metal part of the wand) to turn the device on. To activate the device, the device must be in contact with your skin while your fingers are on the smart sensor. Working from the inside out, slowly glide outward. To clean the tool, gently wipe the head with a dry cloth after use. Store device at room temperature.

Details:
Chat with a Target Beauty Concierge
Highlights
Sheet mask for tired dull stressed out skin
Mask energizes, revitalizes, brightens and boosts the skin
Contains Vitamin C and Rooibos tea extract
Scented with pink grapefruit and mint
Partied too hard? Dull, stressed-out skin? Muster your lustre with a mask that's crammed with gorgeous ingredients to refresh and revive your complexion. BRIGHT + BEAUTIFUL includes Vitamin C and a special white flower skin-brightening complex plus a rooibos tea extract renowned for its energy-boosting properties. Brighten up EVEN MORE with a sprinkling of FLATTERSPHERES for a soft focus touch of radiance. All this - plus a gorgeous pink grapefruit and fresh mint scent - will leave you ready to get up and glow

How to Use:
1. Ensure skin is clean and dry before use.
2. Open the foil and carefully unfold mask.
3. Smooth over your face and gently pat down so the mask feels comfortably snug on your skin. Adjust to fit the contours of your face.
4. Leave for 15-20 mins - the perfect time to chill and relax. If you've had a heavy night, lie down quietly and everything will be all bright!
5. To remove, gently peel off and massage in any excess juice or use a cotton pad to wipe away.

Highlights
Fizzing skin powder cleanses and exfoliates skin
Use as a mask to purify skin
Superfood kale nourishes skin
One pack contains 15+ applications
Vegan, all-natural skincare suits your lifestyle
Keep your skin refreshed and radiant with the unique Skin Fizz Green Kale and Lemongrass Oil Facial Treatment from Nugg. This superfood-powered 3-in-1 fizzing facial combines the benefits of a cleanser, exfoliator and mask all in one product. Just like a bath bomb for your skin! Nutrient-rich Kale nourishes and purifies your skin while Lemongrass Oil cleanses, serves as a natural astringent and lifts your spirits with its pleasant natural spa scent. The all natural and vegan formula is cruelty free and made without alcohol, mineral oil, parabens, preservatives, sulfates, synthetic fragrances, and synthetic colors. One re-sealable pouch contains enough powder for 15+ applications.

Mix about ¼ teaspoon of powder with about ¼ teaspoon of water in the palm of your hand (after breaking down "crumbs" into powder if necessary). Mix with your fingertip until powder forms a fizzing foam, adding drops of water as needed. Apply quickly onto face, avoiding eyes and mouth. Gently massage into skin and rinse off. Close pouch carefully, and store leftover powder in a dry space. Use 2-3 times a week. The lemongrass cleanses and exfoliates the skin, while the kale nourishes.

Proudly made in the USA.

Tips and tricks: For a more spa-like experience, pamper yourself by leaving the mixture on your face as a mask for 2-3 minutes. This will really let the ingredients get to work.

INGREDIENTS
Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Brassica Oleracea (Kale) Powder, Brassica Napus (Canola) Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Oil, Citral (from natural oils), Geraniol (from natural oils), Laminaria Digitata Powder.

Caution: External use only. Avoid eyes and lips. Keep out of reach of children. Ensure formula does not get wet and isn't exposed to steam when storing. Test patch on sensitive skin.
